Smart Toothbrush: Create a toothbrush that can connect to a smartphone app to track brushing habits and provide personalized feedback on brushing technique. The app can also offer customized brushing routines and recommendations based on the user's oral health needs. Confidence Score: 0.8/1

Toothbrush Sanitizer: Design a toothbrush that includes a built-in sanitizing feature, using UV light or other methods, to kill bacteria and germs on the toothbrush. This can help reduce the risk of infection and promote better oral hygiene. Confidence Score: 0.9/1

Vibrating Toothbrush: Develop a toothbrush with vibrating technology that can help improve brushing technique and reach areas of the mouth that may be difficult to clean. The vibrations can also help stimulate the gums and promote healthy blood flow. Confidence Score: 0.8/1

Customizable Toothbrush: Create a toothbrush with interchangeable heads that can be customized to fit the individual's mouth shape and brushing needs. This can help ensure a more comfortable and effective brushing experience. Confidence Score: 0.9/1

Toothbrush with Built-in Sensors: Develop a toothbrush with built-in sensors that can detect and monitor oral health conditions such as gum disease, tooth decay, and plaque buildup. The sensors can also provide real-time feedback to the user on their brushing technique and offer personalized recommendations for improvement. Confidence Score: 0.9/1
